nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: Orbital scan complete. Planet Mirth is in range. Ready for planetary descent?

choices.text: I would like to use a rental loadout

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: Confirmed. Initiating teleport sequence. Good luck down there, Operative.

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: Rental loadout selected. Your current inventory will be transferred to the station bank. You'll receive standard issue equipment: Suppressed SMG, Plasma Repeater, and Energy Saber.

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: Inventory banked. Rental equipment issued. Initiating descent to Mirth.
